content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. As a landlord seeking the highest price possible, I must begin negotiations with a competitive figure. Let's start with a proposed rental price of 1200 Euros per month. Now it's up to you to share your offer and we can proceed from there. Remember, to accept the price you'll say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' if not continuing negotiations mention a reason with 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason]'. If we reach an agreement, respond with 'TERMINATE'.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
